title: Trump calls Bitcoin 'a scam' competing with the dollar
summary: Donald Trump calls Bitcoin 'a scam' competing with the dollar in 2021, marking his initial skepticism before his dramatic transformation to 'crypto president' by 2025. In a Fox Business interview, Trump argued that Bitcoin threatens dollar hegemony and should be heavily regulated.
